title: A Sporting chance
creator_credit: Tasmanian Film Corporation, Anne Whitehead and Jack Zalkalns
brief_description: This film aims to counter the image that “horses sweat, men perspire, but ladies only glow” by encouraging young girls to actively particpate in sport and physical activities. Explores the influence of sex role conditioning in determining the traditionally rigid limits within which girls have been able to find physical expression.
